name: Finset.attach_val
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
s : Finset α
⊢ Eq s.attach.val s.val.attach
decl:
@[simp]
theorem attach_val (s : Finset α) : s.attach.1 = s.1.attach :=
  rfl

name: Finset.mem_attach
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
s : Finset α
x : Subtype fun x => Membership.mem s x
⊢ Membership.mem s.attach x
decl:
@[simp]
theorem mem_attach (s : Finset α) : ∀ x, x ∈ s.attach :=
  Multiset.mem_attach _
